NAME: channelinfo
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to view the information of a channel.
OPTION_CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: The channel to get informations from.
INFOS:
**Information of the channel:** {{channel}}

🆔 | ID: **{{id}}**
🕐 | Creation date: **{{date}}**
📕 | Topic: **{{topic}}**
🔢 | NSFW: **{{nsfw}}**
🌍 | Voice Region (if applicable): **{{voiceRegion}}**
